assessment_item.title: ರಷ್ಯಾದ 1917ರ ‘ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ ಕ್ರಾಂತಿಯ ನೇತೃತ್ವವನ್ನು’ ಈ ಪಕ್ಷವಹಿಸಿತು.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ರಷ್ಯಾದ 1917ರ ‘ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ ಕ್ರಾಂತಿಯ ನೇತೃತ್ವವನ್ನು’ ಈ ಪಕ್ಷವಹಿಸಿತು.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಬೊಲ್ಯವಿಕ್  ಪಕ್ಷ  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4996"},{"text":"

 ಮೆನ್ಶೆವಿಕ್  ಪಕ್ಷ  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4997"},{"text":"

ಸಾಮಾಜಿಕ ಪ್ರಜಾವಾದಿ ಪಕ್ಷ  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5007"},{"text":"

ಸಂವಿಧಾನಿಕ ಪ್ರಜಾಪಕ್ಷ
